successes.title: BelayCords - Reversible USB Charging Cords iPhone & Android
successes.description: With a USB that works in either orientation and a Lifetime Warranty, BelayCords are a more durable and bright way to charge your device

Pledges.description: Early Bird: One (1) BelayCord cable in your color choice. Choose either Lightning, 30-Pin, or Micro USB. Shipping included for US backers. Outside of US add $5.
Single Status: One (1) BelayCord cable in your color choice. Choose either Lightning, 30-Pin, or Micro USB. Shipping included for US backers. Outside of US add $5.
Double the Fun: Two (2) BelayCords cables in your color choice. Choose either Lightning, 30-Pin, or Micro USB. Shipping included for US backers. Outside of US add $5.
Foursome: Four (4) BelayCords cables in your color choice. Choose either Lightning, 30-Pin, or Micro USB. Shipping included for US backers. Outside of US add $5.

6th-Wheel: Six (6) BelayCords cables in your color choice. Choose either Lightning, 30-Pin, Mini USB, or Micro USB. Shipping included for US backers. Outside of US add $5. Add +$5 per BelayCord for longer lengths.

Octuplets: Eight (8) BelayCords cables in your color choice. Choose either Lightning, 30-Pin, Mini USB, or Micro USB. Shipping included for US backers. Outside of US add $5. Add +$5 per BelayCord for longer lengths.
10-Fold Love: Ten (10) BelayCords cables in your color choice. Choose either Lightning, 30-Pin, or Micro USB. Shipping included for US backers. Outside of US add $5.
